content_html: Seven prisoners who had escaped from various jails across the country during the Jansandesh movement have been recaptured in Jhapa. According to District Police Office information officer Pravin Shrestha, the group, comprising five men and two women, had fled from Sundhara Central Jail in Kathmandu, Jhumka Jail in Su

title: Seven Escaped Prisoners Recaptured in Jhapa
